title: What is TF-IDF in Machine Learning?
description: One of the most important ways to resize data in the machine learning process is to use the term frequency inverted document frequency, also known as the tf-idf method. In this article, I will walk you through what the tf-idf method is in Machine Learning and how to implement it using the Python programming language.
